alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:21PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside and north central San Diego Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 421 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, or 8 miles southwest of Anza, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anza, Aguanga, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, Oak Grove, and Cahuilla Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Mountains
